ebit_margin.interpretation: Shows the proportion of revenue left after operating expenses; higher is better.

net_margin.interpretation: Shows the proportion of revenue left as net profit; higher is better.

pbt_margin.description: Profit before tax margin (Resultat efter finansnetto / Nettoomsättning)
pbt_margin.interpretation: Shows the proportion of revenue left before tax; higher is better.

revenue_growth.interpretation: Shows the percentage change in revenue from the previous year.

ebit_growth.interpretation: Shows the percentage change in EBIT from the previous year.

profit_growth.interpretation: Shows the percentage change in net profit from the previous year.

equity_ratio.interpretation: Shows the proportion of assets financed by equity; higher is safer.

return_on_equity.description: Return on equity (Avkastning på eget kapital)
return_on_equity.interpretation: Shows the return generated on shareholders' equity; higher is better.
